channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Documents in Idaho murders case cite autism and the term "sociopath"
item.description: Bryan Kohberger is charged with four counts of murder in the deaths of Ethan Chapin, Xana Kernodle, Madison Mogen and Kaylee Goncalves.

item.title: 'God walks with us through the ashes.' A poignant Ash Wednesday after LA wildfires

item.title: Despite weather concerns, New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras Day and bids farewell to Carnival season

item.description: President Trump on Tuesday night addressed a joint session of Congress, outlining his vision for a second term and priorities for the year ahead. Mich...

item.title: 6 takeaways from Trump's pointedly partisan address to Congress

item.title: Pope well-rested after respiratory failure, Vatican says
item.description: The Vatican said Pope Francis spent the night on "non-invasive mechanical ventilation".

item.title: Dear Life Kit: My friend texts me way too much. How do I get her to stop?

item.title: Poll on Trump's 2025 joint address to Congress finds large majority of viewers approve
item.description: Here's how Donald Trump's 2025 joint address to Congress polled with Americans. A heavily GOP viewership called speech presidential, entertaining.

item.title: Gaza food aid scarce after Israel halts entry
item.description: The UN said at least 80 community kitchens may run out of stock, and remaining food rations will soon run dry.

item.title: Fact-checking Trump's address to Congress
item.description: BBC Verify has looked into several claims made by Trump during his speech to Congress.

item.title: Germany's Merz promises to do 'whatever it takes' on defence
item.description: Germany's likely chancellor-to-be announces a political deal to raise hundreds of billions of euros in extra spending.

item.title: Consumers can buy Zepbound direct from the drugmaker if they'll pay out of pocket
item.description: Eli Lilly is offering vials of its obesity drug Zepbound to patients at a discount — but only if they skip their insurance.

item.title: Six takeaways from Trump's big speech
item.description: The president declares "America is back" as he spars with Democrats and gives a shout-out to Elon Musk.

item.title: Senate panel questions Trump nominee to lead National Institutes of Health
Man allegedly behind 2021 Kabul airport bombing being extradited to U.S.
item.description: Mohammad Sharifullah was allegedly one of two masterminds behind the Abbey Gate bombing that killed 13 American service members.
